name: Return of R2
overview: Your aim is to guide the robot droid R2 around the space station Zegler in order to find and collect the 3 boxes of the compound Z42. Once collected, this must be taken to the power room in order to replenish the space station's energy supply. You will encounter laser bolts, radioactive barriers and much more. You have 20 minutes in which to complete the mission, and R2 has 4 lives.
